page.shortlink: grid component client side ongridstatechange event
page.description: Fires when the state of the Grid has changed.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: isDirty
property.description: Indicates whether or not any edits have been made to the Grid. If isDirty is true, one or more records in the Grid have unsaved changes.
